text: [Vspomnite,] kak skazal Musa svoyemu narodu: "O narod moy! Vy obideli sami sebya, poklonivshis' tel'tsu. Raskaytes' zhe pered Tvortsom, i pust' [blagochestivyye] ub'yut [greshnikov] sredi vas. Eto samoye luchsheye dlya vas pred Tvortsom. I On prostit vas, voistinu, On - proshchayushchiy, miloserdnyy
